text: (yaad rahe) ki jin logon ne hamaaree aayaton se inkaar kiya unhen zaroor anaqareeb jahannum kee aag mein jhonk denge (aur jab unakee khaalen jal kar) jal jaengee to ham unake lie doosaree khaalen badal kar paida kare denge taaki vah achchhee tarah azaab ka maza chakhen beshak khuda haracheez par gaalib aur hikamat vaala hai
